title: Business Development Representative
description:
At BioRender, we’re on a mission to accelerate the world’s ability to learn, discover, and communicate science — transforming how knowledge is shared and making science open, collaborative, and easily understandable by all.

We’re shaping the future of science communication and are looking for talented individuals to help bring this vision to life! 🚀

We are looking for a passionate and motivated Business Development Representative with a love for selling and a tenacious and methodical approach to prospecting and developing new business opportunities. Check us out on RepVue!

This role is remote-friendly only within Boston or Greater Boston and San Diego.

You will be successful in this role with

  • Exceptional customer curiosity: You are genuinely interested in learning about the clients we serve, their goals, and their science communication pain points. You are curious, love asking questions, and can think outside of the box.

  • A continuous improvement approach: You have a growth mindset and you’re open to coaching and continuous feedback. You are able to thrive in a fast-paced and collaborative environment with changing goals and priorities.

  • A self-starter attitude: You are self-motivated, resourceful, and know how to hustle.

What you'll be doing

  • Prospect new leads (outbound) and create amazing first impressions with potential customers and partners while building pipeline for account executives and senior management

  • Follow up and qualify inbound requests via telephone and email, for scientific and business fit

  • Organize, categorize, and prioritize sales leads in CRM and measure lead conversion and performance against quota

  • Become an expert in the features, benefits and application of BioRender’s software

  • Leverage prospecting tools to research companies and identify key stakeholders at new accounts

  • Develop customized pitches for different target accounts and personas

  • Work with Account Executives to drive outbound prospecting activities, including cold calling, emailing, and communicating our value proposition to decision-makers

  • Work with the field marketing and sales teams to drive attendance at BioRender field events such as executive dinners and happy hours

What you bring to the table

  • 1+ year of prior experience as a BDR in a SaaS environment

  • Strong verbal and written communication skills

  • Not afraid to pick up the phone and cold call

  • Strong self-motivation and willingness to go beyond strict job responsibilities

  • Committed to meet/exceed goals with a proven history of consistent high achievement 

  • Willing to work during EST business hours

  • A bachelor of Science degree or equivalent is a plus (e.g. within the fields of life science including biology, biotechnology, biomedical engineering, biochemistry, etc)

What you can expect from our interview process

  • Introductory call: We will set up a 20-30 minute phone call with one of our recruiters, during which you’ll have the opportunity to share more about your experience and interests.

  • Hiring Manager interview: You will meet with one of our Business Development Managers, Michael Litwin or Paige Anderson. You’ll learn more about BioRender and the team you’re interviewing with. Feel free to ask any questions throughout these calls!

  • Practical interview: You’ll be completing a practical exercise so we can see your skills in action and give you a realistic role preview. This exercise will be conducted with our BD Manager.

  • Meet the team: Throughout our interview process, you can expect to meet with some of your potential colleagues.

Why join us?

  • We are mission-driven: we work collaboratively towards our shared vision of improving scientific communication and accelerating scientific discovery. BioRender figures have appeared in more than 54,000 publications! 

  • BioRender is loved by millions! We have a world-class NPS and a community of loyal fans and users in 200+ countries!

  • Our company is backed by top investors and accelerators like Y Combinator, and we are on a growth trajectory comparable to many top-performing SaaS companies 

  • We’re remote-first with team members across Canada and the U.S., offering you the flexibility to work from anywhere. 

BioRender is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Reporting
Senior Software Engineer - Reporting
Patient Care Services Representative
description:
About Winona:

Winona is one of the leading telemedicine companies providing HRT for women in menopause. We’ve built all of our technology in house including an EHR, patient care admin system, patient portal, website, marketing technology etc. Winona has two compounding pharmacies and a team of in house physicians providing world-class care via a fully vertically integrated business model.

About the role:

We are looking for a dedicated and proactive Patient Care Services Representative to join our team. In this full-time position, you will act as a liaison, accurately and efficiently providing product and service information, answering questions, and resolving any emerging customer problems.

Seniority Level: Entry-Mid Level

 

Responsibilities:

  • Serve as a facilitator between the patient and the company, ensuring a seamless experience. 

  • Answering questions about Willow’s, offering accurate information about our products and services 

  • Delivering information about Willow’s offerings.

  • Ensuring patient satisfaction and maintaining professional patient support.

  • Handling patient complaints and identifying the appropriate response and strategy to solve customers' issues as quickly as possible.

  • Keep records of patient interactions, process patient accounts, and file documents.

  • Take the extra mile to engage with patients.

  • Stay updated with Willow’s products, policies, and services to provide informed support. 

 

Requirements:

  • Experience working in a medical-related job.

  • Excellent English communication and writing skills.

    • English proficiency must be at C1 or C2

  • Strong customer service experience.

  • Hands-on experience in Excel/Google Sheets, Word/Google Docs, and other computer basics.

  • Comfortable making calls with patients.

  • Attention to detail and a good sense of judgment.

Nice to have:

  • Experience working in telemedicine or related medical contexts.

  • Experience supporting customers through the Intercom platform. 

What’s in it for you?

As full-time member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

  • Flexible hours

  • Work wherever you choose

  • Fun and casual work environment

  • Employee engagement activities and virtual gatherings

  • We are a diverse, global team! 🌍

Equal Employment Opportunity

Winona provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, pregnancy, age, national origin, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected classification. Equal employment opportunity extends to all aspects of employment including, but not limited to, recruitment, hiring, training, promotion, demotion, transfer, leaves of absence, and termination. Winona takes allegations of discrimination, harassment, and retaliation seriously and will promptly investigate such behaviors.

title: Senior Graphic Designer
description:
About Winona:

Winona is one of the leading telemedicine companies providing HRT for women in menopause. We’ve built all of our technology in house including an EHR, patient care admin system, patient portal, website, marketing technology etc. Winona has two compounding pharmacies and a team of in house physicians providing world-class care via a fully vertically integrated business model.

About the role:

We are looking for a talented and passionate Senior Graphic Designer to join our company. In this full-time position, you will contribute to creating visually stunning and impactful digital campaigns that drive results for our company.

You’ll have the opportunity to choose your hours and work and learn with a team of world-class engineers and designers through a commitment to team collaboration, communication, and product quality.

This position requires working a fixed US schedule, with standard hours from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (EST).

Seniority Level: Senior Level

Responsibilities:

  • Develop visual concepts, graphics, and layouts for digital advertising campaigns

  • Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to understand project requirements and objectives

  • Present design concepts and ideas to internal teams, and incorporate feedback into final designs

  • Ensure that all designs meet the company standard and align with project briefs and brand guidelines

  • Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends and strategies, integrate new resources/techniques where needed

Requirements:

  • 5 years of experience in digital graphic design or related field

  • Proven experience as a digital designer with a portfolio of strong paid advertising work

  • Proficiency utilizing Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects, etc.), Figma

  • Experience producing designs for emails, social media, and paid media

  • Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and layout principles

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

  • A self-starter mindset with a passion for delivering fast output and good design

Nice-to-haves:

  • Bachelor’s degree in graphic design, visual arts, or related field

  • Proficient in digital motion and video graphic production tools

  • Experience in retail marketing or digital branding

  • Direct experience with consumer e-commerce

  • Experience working in the telemedicine field.

What’s in it for you?

As full-time member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

  • Flexible hours

  • Work wherever you choose

  • Fun and casual work environment

  • Employee engagement activities and virtual gatherings

  • We are a diverse, global team! 🌍

Equal Employment Opportunity

Winona provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, pregnancy, age, national origin, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected classification. Equal employment opportunity extends to all aspects of employment including, but not limited to, recruitment, hiring, training, promotion, demotion, transfer, leaves of absence, and termination. Winona takes allegations of discrimination, harassment, and retaliation seriously and will promptly investigate such behaviors.

title: Production & Studio Assisant
description:
🚀 Ready to Join the Adventure of a Lifetime? 🚀

Wait a minute. 

🚀 Ready to Dive into the World of Studio Production?

What if your next internship wasn’t just a line on your CV… but a pivotal step toward building an iconic brand alongside a team that lives for 🔥 ambition, and 😍 impact?

Are you eager to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced EdTech company that is changing lives worldwide? Do you dream of being at the heart of a dynamic studio, helping bring ideas to life through incredible productions? If so, keep reading – because this might be the perfect opportunity for you!

Why Join Us? 🗽 Freedom – Work in a hybrid environment where you are trusted to take ownership and make an impact. 🔥 Ambition – Collaborate with passionate, driven professionals aiming to build a world-class brand. 😍 Impact – See your contributions come to life as we create content that inspires and transforms millions.

This is a part-time or full time internship, apprenticeship or entry-level position, based at our beautiful Studios in Paris.

YOUR MISSION 🚀 

-------------------------------

🎯 Your main goal will be to support the operational heartbeat of our Paris audiovisual studio — ensuring every shoot, livestream, and production runs smoothly, on time, and at the highest quality possible.

Our sources of inspiration are Apple, Nike, Spotify, Disney for their obsession of excelling, having a worldwide impact and not just selling products but crafting experiences.

For us, being Iconic is to innovate at the intersection of Psychology x Creativity x Technology.

You’ll be our go-to person for studio coordination, production support, and creative collaboration.

1 | 🎥  Studio Coordination & Logistics

  • Assist with setting up for shoots, interviews, and live events

  • Manage studio inventory, supplies, and equipment logistics

  • Help with light administrative tasks (e.g., parcels, invoices, expense tracking)

  • Ensure smooth day-to-day studio operations

2 | ⚙️  Hands-On Filming Production Support 

  • Maintain an organized, clean, and functional studio space

  • Ensure gear is stored, maintained, and always shoot-ready

  • Contribute ideas to improve systems and workflows

3 | 🧼 Studio Upkeep & Equipment Care

  • Maintain an organized, clean, and functional studio space

  • Ensure gear is stored, maintained, and always shoot-ready

  • Contribute ideas to improve systems and workflows

4 |  🎤 Event & Special Project Support

  • Jump in to support live events, VIP interviews, and special production

5 | 🌟 Team Collaboration & Creative Energy

  • Collaborate closely with producers, editors, and creative leads

  • Bring ideas to brainstorms and learn from top industry professionals

  • Get mentorship and feedback that’ll fast-track your growth

👉 Apply now and let’s build something extraordinary together! 👈

DO YOU RECOGNIZE YOURSELF? 😍

-------------------------------

Who is this for

  • This isn’t just an internship—it’s a launchpad 🚀

You might be a fit if you’re:

  • A student or recent grad in media, production, film, or audiovisual studies

  • Fundamental understanding of camera, lighting, and sound equipment.

  • Obsessed with behind-the-scenes work that makes on-screen magic possible

  • Proactive, hands-on, and energized by fast-paced environments

  • Detail-driven, organized, and thrive when juggling multiple tasks

  • Hungry to learn and eager to take initiative

Bonus Points If You Have

  • Familiarity with video editing tools (Premiere Pro, After Effects, etc.)

  • Past experience on media, film, or content projects

Languages

  • French: Fluent

  • English: Intermediate to Fluent (we’re an international team!)

IT MIGHT NOT BE FOR YOU 🙅‍♀️

-------------------------------

Let’s be clear, we are looking for someone who is not just Great, and for whom Paradox ambition isn’t just another cool project; but a true mission.

So if those personal interests : personal development / coaching / professional growth / education / edtech / teaching / edutainment are not things you REALLY love, and want to solve for other, let’s forget it

Let’s forget about it also if,

  • You don’t like to be challenged and grow in your job

  • You don't like receiving or giving tough feedbacks

  • You don’t question the status quo: the process are there for a reason, we have always done it this way

  • You like to have very specific & fixed tasks assigned to you. Be told what to do and how to do it.

  • Your only driver is joining a full-remote company: yes, our company culture is cool, but we want people to care about our mission, products, and their job!

🤩 JOIN US IF YOU CRAVE

-------------------------------

1 - Growth & Ambition 🚀


🏅 We hire only the best, it’s exhilarating to be surrounded by A-players who strive to perform whilst being in a good mood. You'll be working with some of the best minds. We understand that "A" people attract "A" people.

🏋️‍♀️ No more bosses, but ongoing conversations to support your professional development.

⚡️ Being part of an ambitious company with a lot of growth opportunities.

2 - Impact & Meaning 🔥

🦄 Playing a crucial role in the development of a company whose content and products are enjoyed by millions of people
🤩 Waking up in the morning knowing you are making a difference: we receive messages every day from clients who have successfully lost weight, quit smoking, reach a mile stone in their business, built better relationships, and made positive changes in their lives.

But that’s not all, we believe that driven people deserve…

3 - Freedom & Well Being 🗽☀️

😎 A company culture based on autonomy & accountability
🌎 A remote culture from day one with the freedom to work from wherever you want
🏤 Magnificent offices in Dubai, Lisbon & Paris. You’re at home worldwide

😎 A company culture based on autonomy & accountability
🗽 Flexible working hours

HIRING PROCESS 📃

-------------------------------

That job description resonated with you?

Here is your tailor made hiring process

Click on "Apply for this position" and fill out a short questionnaire (7 to 8 minutes) to tell us more about yourself and send us your CV!

📃 A 6 to 8 minutes application survey.

📃 A 15/20 minutes what’s app call with Chloé, our HR Talent Manager, to tell you more about the challenge and see if it fits with your experience and expectations,

💻 A 15-30 minutes video call with Chloé, our HR, to assess the fit between the position, the company, and your own career path.
💻 A video call with Youcef, the Studio Referent to dive deeper into your technical skills, see how we can match your desires with our needs and for you both to understand how you could fit in Paradox’s social media team.

🫵🚀 Welcome aboard!

About our hiring process

Our recruitment process is tailored to do our best to avoid that you or us realize that we’re not a perfect fit. Every step serves a purpose and will allow us to get to know you better as much as it’ll help you understand more where you’ll be stepping in.

We also want you to have time to ask all of your questions regarding the mission, the long-term vision of your team and the company, our values, with the relevant interlocutor in front of you.

About our hiring process

Our recruitment process is tailored to do our best to avoid that you or us realize that we’re not a perfect fit. Every step serves a purpose and will allow us to get to know you better as much as it’ll help you understand more where you’ll be stepping in.

We also want you to have time to ask all of your questions regarding the mission, the long-term vision of your team and the company, our values, with the relevant interlocutor in front of you.

But maybe YOU WONDER WHAT’S OUR STORY ? 😉

-------------------------------

At Paradox, we are convinced that people do not want “just a job” anymore.

We are all craving to have an impact through our professional journey. Some want to start their own venture, some want to become an intrapreneur in their current organization, some others just want their day-to-day tasks to have more meaning.

🎯 PARADOX HAS ONE GOAL: TO EMPOWER PEOPLE AND ORGANIZATIONS TO LIVE THEIR TRUE AMBITIONS.

But where do we start?

If you have an interest in personal development, you probably already know that:

  • Making things happen is a real struggle when you don’t know what truly inspires you and how to get there ;

  • Available resources are either boring 😴 or full of crazy unsubstantiated theories 🤪.

It needs to change, and we’re here to make it happen!

⭐️ OUR AMBITION IS TO MAKE SUCCESS THE ONLY POSSIBLE OUTCOME FOR OUR CLIENTS (WHATEVER SUCCESS MEANS FOR THEM), BY CRAFTING INNOVATIVE & CAPTIVATING BREAKTHROUGH EXPERIENCES.

In other words, we want to make personal growth as entertaining as watching Netflix.

How, you might be wondering?

  • We travel the world and surround ourselves with top entrepreneurs (Richard Branson - Founder of Virgin, Marc Simoncini - Founder of Meeting, Fred Mazzella - Founder of BlablaCar), world athletes (Tony Parker - Hall of fame NBA Player, Frederick Bousquet - World record in 50m free swimming, Frank Leboeuf - WorldCup Footballer), and artists (Gad Elmaleh - Comedian, Franck Dubosc, Barry Osborne - Producer of Lord of the Rings and Matrix) ✊;

  • We reverse engineer their strategies for achieving success and fulfillment and lean on the latest researches about neurosciences ⚙️;

  • We deliver trainings & educational contents around Power Skills (critical thinking, productivity, leadership, public speaking, coaching, stress management, etc.), self-growth and performance, through a balanced set of e-learning programs, events and edutainment videos 💡.

From one well-known Founder to a team of +45 people today (and counting!), this approach has paid off and enabled us to exceed 2 million followers on social networks, and to have thousands of people attending our online events and training courses.

🔥 TOGETHER, WE ARE DRIVEN BY ONE DREAM:

  1. Helping 100 000 people achieve their dream and display their pictures on what we call the “100 000 dreams wall” ;

  2. Giving our clients access to constant personal growth by reinventing their learning experience ;

  3. Leverage AI and other technology to provide an outstanding customized experience to millions of people for them to transform their lives. 

And that’s where you come in. Join the Paradox Revolution !

title: Junior Product Manager
description:
About Winona:

Winona is one of the leading telemedicine companies providing HRT for women in menopause. We’ve built all of our technology in house including an EHR, patient care admin system, patient portal, website, marketing technology etc. Winona has two compounding pharmacies and a team of in house physicians providing world-class care via a fully vertically integrated business model.

About the role:

We are looking for a talented and passionate Junior Product Manager to join our team. In this full-time position, you will lead experimentation efforts, leveraging data-driven insights to refine website copy, design, and image assets. Your day by day will have a strong focus on A/B testing and website optimization to enhance conversion rates. 

Responsibilities:

  • Design, execute, and analyze A/B tests to optimize conversion rates across key website pages.

  • Continuously refine copy, design, and visual assets to enhance user engagement and overall performance.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with design, development, and marketing teams to implement test results and drive improvements.

  • Utilize experimentation platforms like Optimizely (or similar tools) to manage and track testing efforts.

  • Define, monitor, and interpret key performance metrics to assess test effectiveness and inform decision-making.

  • Support broader product management initiatives, including roadmap development, stakeholder communication, and feature prioritization.

Requirements:

  • +2 years of experience as a Product Manager or in a similar role.

  • Hands-on experience with A/B testing and conversion rate optimization (CRO).

  • Familiarity with tools like Optimizely, Google Optimize, or other experimentation platforms (preferred but not required).

  • Strong analytical skills, with the ability to translate data into actionable insights.

  • Experience working on website or digital product optimization projects.

  • Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to work effectively across cross-functional teams.

  • Passion for data-driven decision-making and using A/B testing to enhance user experience and business impact.

What’s in it for you?

As full-time member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

  • Flexible hours

  • Work wherever you choose

  • Fun and casual work environment

  • Employee engagement activities and virtual gatherings

  • We are a diverse, global team! 🌍

Equal Employment Opportunity

Winona provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, pregnancy, age, national origin, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected classification. Equal employment opportunity extends to all aspects of employment including, but not limited to, recruitment, hiring, training, promotion, demotion, transfer, leaves of absence, and termination. Winona takes allegations of discrimination, harassment, and retaliation seriously and will promptly investigate such behaviors.

title: HR Operations Manager
description:
About Winona:

Winona is one of the leading telemedicine companies providing HRT for women in menopause. We’ve built all of our technology in house including an EHR, patient care admin system, patient portal, website, marketing technology etc. Winona has two compounding pharmacies and a team of in house physicians providing world-class care via a fully vertically integrated business model.

About the role:

We are looking for a proactive and adaptable HR Operations Manager to join our fast-growing team. This role requires a well-rounded professional with a strong background in human resources and operations. The ideal candidate will be an excellent multi-tasker with a sharp eye for detail and a passion for fostering a positive and engaging employee experience.

Seniority Level: Senior Level 

Responsibilities:

Human Resources:

Manage the full employee lifecycle, including onboarding, offboarding, and ongoing employee relations.

  • Process international payroll, benefits administration, and time and attendance, ensuring timely and accurate processing.

  • Maintain accurate employee records and ensure compliance with local and international employment laws and regulations.

  • Provide continuous support and guidance to employees regarding HR policies, procedures, and benefits.

  • Coordinate training and development programs, fostering a growth-oriented and constantly improving environment.

  • Facilitate performance reviews and goal-setting processes, ensuring effective feedback mechanisms are in place.

Operations:

  • Manage vendor relationships and oversee vendor payments, ensuring smooth and efficient workflows.

  • Plan and coordinate all-hands meetings and other company events, creating opportunities for interaction across all organizational levels.

  • Oversee operational tasks, ensuring the efficient functioning of the organization and collaborating with other departments to address urgent needs.

  • Collaborate in improving and optimizing internal operational processes and implementing new strategies to enhance organizational efficiency.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field.

  • Ideally, a minimum of 3+ years of experience in human resources or operations roles in a high-growth environment.

  • Experience in international payroll administration.

  • Knowledge of U.S. employment laws and regulations, including tax compliance, labor laws, and benefits administration, ensuring full compliance and minimizing legal risks.

  • Experience managing vendor relationships and payments.

  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy, with excellent organizational and time management skills.

  • Ability to prioritize tasks, work independently, and maintain flexibility in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

  • Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively at all organizational levels.

  • Ability to maintain discretion when handling highly sensitive and confidential employee and organizational matters.

  • A positive and solution-oriented attitude

Nice to have:

  • Experience working with international remote teams, with a strong understanding of the dynamics and challenges of managing a distributed workforce.

  • Experience in telemedicine or related medical contexts, particularly in managing operations within healthcare or telehealth settings.

  • Familiarity with software platforms such as Gusto, Deel, Mercury, Slack, and Google Suite.

What’s in it for you?

As full-time member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

  • Flexible hours

  • Work wherever you choose

  • Fun and casual work environment

  • Employee engagement activities and virtual gatherings

  • We are a diverse, global team! 🌍

Equal Employment Opportunity

Winona provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, pregnancy, age, national origin, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected classification. Equal employment opportunity extends to all aspects of employment including, but not limited to, recruitment, hiring, training, promotion, demotion, transfer, leaves of absence, and termination. Winona takes allegations of discrimination, harassment, and retaliation seriously and will promptly investigate such behaviors.

title: Video Editor
description:
About Winona:

Winona is one of the leading telemedicine companies providing HRT for women in menopause. We’ve built all of our technology in house including an EHR, patient care admin system, patient portal, website, marketing technology etc. Winona has two compounding pharmacies and a team of in house physicians providing world-class care via a fully vertically integrated business model.

About the role:

We’re looking to hire a full-time, remote Video Editor to join our creative team. You’ll have the opportunity to choose your hours and work and learn with a team of world-class designers, through a commitment to team collaboration, communication, and product quality.

Seniority Level: Junior

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the video editing process from start to finish 

  • Edit and organize raw video footage 

  • Collaborate with other departments and teams 

  • Develop video concepts and storyboards 

  • Enhance video’s visual and audio quality

  • Create and implement video style guides 

  • Stay updated with current emerging trends and techniques

Requirements:

  • Minimum of 5 years of experience as an editor

  • Expert knowledge in Adobe Premiere and Adobe After Effects

  • Strong sense of visual storytelling

  • Can manage multiple post-production projects at the same time

  • Great interpersonal skills, good judgment, and comfortable working with other creatives and management

  • Has an understanding of devices, frame rates, codecs, file formats, and cameras

What’s in it for you?

As full-time member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

title: Lojistik Uzmanı / Ankara
description:
Bir teknolojisi firması olarak faaliyet gösterdiğimiz tüm pazarlarda lider olmak vizyonuyla çıktığımız yolda bize katılmak ister misin?

Kurumsalın alışılagelmiş ifadelerinden ve hiyerarşiden uzak heyecan verici bir kariyere başlamak için en iyi yönlerini ortaya çıkarmaya hazır, dinamik, entelektüel açıdan meraklı genç profesyoneller arıyoruz. Hızla büyümeye devam eden bir teknoloji şirketi olarak gerçek hayatta yaşanan sorunları çözme ve profesyonel yaşamı deneyimleme imkanı sunuyoruz. Yaptığın işin tüm sorumluluğunu almak istiyorsan, işine katkı sağlayacak yeni fikirlerin olduğunda sesini duyurmak istiyorsan ve olağanüstü bir işbaşında eğitim deneyimi yaşamaya hazırsan; o zaman meydan okumaya hazırsın. Bu heyecana ortak olup başarımızı daha da ileriye taşıyacak Lojistik Uzmanı arıyoruz.

🎯 Sorumluluklar

  • Teslimat zaman çizelgeleri ve müşteri beklentileri karşılanırken maliyet etkinliğinin sağlanması için nakliye rotalarının ve taşıyıcı seçiminin optimize edilmesi
  • Lojistik fonksiyonu içinde süreç iyileştirme alanlarının belirlenmesi ve verimliliğin arttırılması, maliyetin düşürülmesi ve müşteri memnuniyetinin sağlanması için çözümler önerilmesi
  • Müşteriler ve satıcılar için teslimat süreçlerindeki sorunların takip edilmesi ve çözülmesi
  • Teslimat deneyimini iyileştirmek için 3PL iş ortaklarının yönlendirilmesi ve koordine edilmesi
  • Teslimat KPI’larının günlük olarak analiz edilmesi ve hataların ortadan kaldırılması için 3PL iş ortaklarının performansının takip edilmesi
  • Teslimatla ilgili müşteri ve satıcı şikayetlerinin analiz edilmesi, sorunlu noktaların tespit edilmesi ve işbirlikçi bir yaklaşımla aksiyonların alınması
  • Lojistik operasyonlarının performans ölçümü ve sürekli gelişim için KPI raporlarının yönetime sunulması
  • Stok doğruluğunun oluşması için, malzemelerin sistemsel giriş ve çıkışların zamanında tamamlanmasının sağlanması
  • Acenteler ile teslimat iletişimlerinin kurulması, sisteme lojistik ile ilgili duyuruların yüklenmesi
  • Haftalık sevk ve rota planlarının oluşturulması
  • Lojistik firmaları ile rota planlarına uygun olarak haftalık araç tedariğinin görüşülmesi ve araçların takip edilmesi
  • Çiçek arabası, rafı, çiçek kovası, palet gibi depolar ve tedarikçiler arasında hareket gören sabit kıymetlerin takip edilmesi ve kontrolü
  • Operasyon alanında kullanılan sarf malzeme (koli-bant-pelür kağıt) ihtiyaçları için Satın Alma Siparişi (SAS) oluşturulması, SAS'ların tedarikçilere iletilmesi, olası sorunlarda tedarikçiler ile görüşülmesi ve gelen ürünlerin mal kabul işlemlerinin yapılması
  • Depoya ulaşan ve depodan çıkan araçların sıcaklık takibinin yapılması ve takip raporlarının oluşturulması
  • Sevkiyat süreçlerinin tamamlanmasının ardından ilgili lojistik firmaları ile mutabakat süreçlerinin tamamlanıp faturaların sisteme girişi ve rapor haline getirilmesi
  • Çiçek üreticilerinden gelen ürünlerin kalite kontrolünün yapılması
  • Mal kabulü yapılan ürünlerin standartlara uygun olarak depolanmasının takibi
  • Sevkiyat öncesi ve sırasında ürünlerin kontrolünün yapılarak standart dışı olan ürünlerin ayrılması
  • Sahadan gelen geri bildirimleri takip ederek kalite iyileştirme çalışmalarının yapılması
  • Ürünlerin kalitesinin raporlaması
  • İade kontrolleri ve kabullerinin yapılması
    • ,

    ✨ Aranan Nitelikler

  • Ön lisans ya da lisans bölümlerinden mezun
  • İlgili alanda en az 2 yıl tecrübeye sahip
  • MS Office programlarına hakim
  • Analiz, raporlama, zaman yönetimi becerilerine sahip ve iş takibi kuvvetli
  • Yoğun çalışma temposuna ve esnek çalışma saatlerine ayak uydurabilecek
  • Planlama, organizasyon ve iletişim becerileri gelişmiş
  • Tercihen kalite kontrol ve kesme çiçek, saksı bitkileri veya zirai ürünlerin üretiminde deneyimli deneyimli
    • ,

    😎 Burada seni neler bekliyor?

  • 🎉 Heyecan verici bir başlangıca hazır mısın?
  • Heyecan verici takım aktiviteleri ve unutulmaz şirket etkinlikleriyle dolu anılar biriktirmeye hazır mısın?
  • 🛍️ Kendine İyi Bak!
  • İyi hissetmen bizim için önemli! Wellbeing programı, Momento ve daha fazlası burada seni bekliyor.
  • 🎩 Kendi Tarzını Yansıt!
  • İster klasik ister casual giyin, burada kendini rahat hissedeceğin bir ortam seni bekliyor.
  • 📚 Potansiyelini Keşfet!
  • Her iki haftada bir öğrenme saatleri ve zengin eğitim kütüphanesiyle gelişimine yatırım yap! 🎓 Udemy gibi birçok kaynağa erişimle, kendini sürekli geliştirme fırsatını yakala..
  • 🥰 Sosyal Kulüplerle Renkli Bir Deneyim!
  • İlgi alanlarını paylaşan iş arkadaşlarınla bir araya gel, unutulmaz anılar biriktir ve güçlü bağlar kur!
  • 🤝 Yeni Macerana Güçlü Bir Başlangıç!
  • İlk günden itibaren kendini güvende ve desteklenmiş hissedeceksin! Kapsamlı onboarding sürecimiz sayesinde yeni rolüne hızla adapte olmanı sağlıyoruz.
  • 🌟 Bu Heyecan Dolu Yolculuğa Katıl!
  • Dinamik bir çalışma ortamı, eğlenceli ekip aktiviteleri, esnek giyim kuralları ve sınırsız öğrenme fırsatlarıyla dolu bir deneyim seni bekliyor! Şimdi tam potansiyelini ortaya çıkarma zamanı! 💃
    • 😍 Hakkımızda
    En kolay ve ekonomik yoldan çiçek göndermeyi sağlamak için 2006’da kurulan ciceksepeti.com, Türkiye genelinde 55.000+ iş ortağı ve 70’den fazla ile gönderimini sağladığı binlerce siparişle, Türkiye'deki en büyük online çiçekçidir.😎

    Çiçeksepeti; çiçek aranjmanları, kek ve kurabiye buketlerinin yanı sıra kişiselleştirilmiş hediyeler ile müşterilerine binlerce alternatif sunarak özel günlerde ilk akla gelen e-ticaret firmasıdır. Türkiye'deki başarı hikayemizi, LolaFlora markası ile Meksika'da sürdürürken, bir teknoloji firması olarak, hediye alanındaki pazar liderliğimizi yeni iş modellerimize de taşımak vizyonu ile emin adımlarla ilerliyoruz. 💃

    "İşe alım süreçlerimizde kişisel verilerinizi nasıl işlediğimize dair bilgiye çalışan adayı aydınlatma metnimizden ulaşabilirsiniz./ Please see our candidate privacy note for information on how we process your personal data during our recruitment activities."
    https://cdn03.ciceksepeti.com/editor/hr/Ciceksepeti_CS-Teknoloji-Calisan-Adayi_Aydinlatma-Metni-15092023.pdf
    https://cdn03.ciceksepeti.com/editor/hr/Ciceksepeti_CS-Teknoloji-Calisan-Adayi_Aydinlatma-Metni-15092023.docx.pdf

title: Talent Acquisition & Employee Experience Specialist
description:
Want to join us as we move closer to be a leader in all markets in which we operate, as a pioneering tech company?

We’re looking for a teammate ready to bring out the best in themselves to kick off an exciting career devoid of corporate buzzwords and bureaucracy. Instead, we offer real-life cases to resolve and a true taste of professional life in a high-growth, high-speed tech company. If you want to hold full accountability of your work, if you want to be heard when you have new ideas to contribute to the business, and if you’re ready to experience exceptional on-the-job training; then you’re ready for the challenge.

🎯Your Journey Begins: Embrace the Exciting Adventure Ahead!

  • Executing end-to-end (White & Blue Collar) recruitment cycle to ensure a consistent flow of right candidates for the business, an exceptional journey for the candidates, and timely results for the hiring managers
  • Creating ad hoc reports on recruitment KPIs, by actively using our ATS (applicant tracking system)  
  • Mapping the passive candidates in the industry to create talent-pipelines for prospective business needs
  • Serve as a point of contact for the Recruiting team - provide all the support and expertise to empower them to do their jobs
  • Ensuring management of consultancy processes
  • Providing operational support to the organizational design process, and the analysis of existing or new positions that may arise in line with organizational growth and change,
  • Supporting the development, implementation, follow-up and reporting of Training and Development Processes.
  • Closely following global HR trends and industry best practices and supporting the benchmarking process
    • ,

    🥰Are You the One We’re Seeking?

  • BA/BSc degree in relevant academic disciplines
  • 1-2 years of experience in recruitment (white & blue collar) in a high-speed, high-growth environment
  • Advanced skills in MS Office Programs
  • Strong ability to research and follow-up, successful time management, strong analysis, and reporting skills
    • ,

    ✨Let Your Skills Shine with Us!

  • You're comfortable with learning on the fly, tech-savvy, and resourceful
  • You’re a problem solver
  • You have good communication skills
  • You're an excellent content producer with an eye for details
  • You're skilled at documenting & presenting your assignments 
  • You're a top-notch recruiter with analytical and creative skills
    • ,

    😎 What’s in here for you?

  • 🌈🛍️ Take excellent care of yourself: Wellbeing program, Momento, and More!
  • 👩🏻‍⚕️🎩 Express Your Unique Style: No more stuffy suits or uncomfortable attire. Embrace your personal style and wear whatever makes you feel confident and comfortable
  • 👗👕📚 Unlock Your Potential: Biweekly Learning Hours and a Vast Training Library Await! 🎓 Never stop learning and growing! With unlimited access to top-notch training resources like Udemy and more, your professional growth knows no limits!
  • 🚀🥰 Join Vibrant Social Clubs: Connect, Collaborate, and Create Lifelong Friendships! 🎉Be part of our vibrant social clubs, where you can engage with colleagues who share your passions and interests. Cultivate meaningful connections, foster collaboration, and create memories that extend beyond the workplace
  • 🤝🤝Seamless Onboarding: Receive a Warm Welcome and a Smooth Transition! 📋 Our dedicated onboarding process ensures you feel supported and empowered from day one. We provide comprehensive training and resources to help you settle into your role quickly and effectively
  • 🌟Join us on this exciting journey a dynamic work ecosystem, thrilling team activities, entertainment galore, a flexible dress code, and endless learning opportunities await you! It’s time to unleash your full potential and embrace the future of work! 💃
    • 😍 About Us

    As a pioneering tech company in gifts, our vision is to be a leader in all markets in which we operate. We create lifelong value in the lives of our employees, customers and all our business partners! 💪

    Founded in 2006 by Emre Aydın, Ciceksepeti.com offers the broadest selection of flowers & gifts delivered the same day within a single experience. We are very proud to have created a culture of celebration among people with our gift arrangements and our brand Bonnyfood. We are committed to continuing this tradition by making every special day memorable. In addition to our original mission of bringing a new perspective to the e-commerce sector in Turkey and making shipping faster and easier, now we offer a diverse range of products under various categories, such as electronics, home & living, personal care, supermarket, cosmetics, fashion, sports & outdoor, hobby, pet shop, jewelry & accessories, as well as flowers and edible flowers since 2019.Ciceksepeti.com is the most visited floral and gifting website according to SimilarWeb data, having 4 times more visitors than the second largest player in the world. 😎

    Besides covering 70+ cities in Turkey through 55.000+ vendors and 24x7 customer support, Ciceksepeti has expanded into Mexico with its international brand, LolaFlora.💃We are so happy and proud to have been selected the Best Employer Brand at LinkedIn Turkey Talent Awards in 2019 and 2022! 🥳

    Headquartered in İstanbul, we’re a young, nimble, dedicated team of professionals, who are not only hard workers but also smart workers; who know how to get things done in the right way, as well as getting the right things done for our customers. Moreover, we’re on the verge of an exciting episode in our journey as we simultaneously set foot on international markets and grow further in the domestic market.

    "İşe alım süreçlerimizde kişisel verilerinizi nasıl işlediğimize dair bilgiye çalışan adayı aydınlatma metnimizden ulaşabilirsiniz./ Please see our candidate privacy note for information on how we process your personal data during our recruitment activities."
    https://cdn03.ciceksepeti.com/editor/hr/Ciceksepeti_Calisan_Adayi_Aydinlatma_Metni_2024-08-29.pdf
    https://cdn03.ciceksepeti.com/editor/hr/CS_Teknoloji_Calisan_Adayi_Aydinlatma_Metni_2024-08-29.pdf

title: HR Business Partner
description:
Sumsub is the one verification platform to secure the whole user journey. With Sumsub’s customizable KYC, KYB, transaction monitoring and fraud prevention solutions, you can orchestrate your verification process, welcome more customers worldwide, meet compliance requirements, reduce costs and protect your business.

Sumsub has over 4000 clients across the fintech, crypto, transportation, trading and gaming industries including Duolingo, Bitpanda, Wirex, Avis, Exness, Flippa, italki, Bybit, LBANK, Gett, Kaizen Gaming, and TransferGo.

Our products are recognised by industry leaders like Gartner's Magic Quadrant, Forrester Wave™ and Frost Radar™.

We are looking for a strategic and hands-on HR Business Partner to support our Customer Operations department - one of the fastest-growing and most dynamic teams at Sumsub. This role is key to driving employee growth, development, and organizational effectiveness, ensuring our people thrive in a fast-paced, customer-focused environment.

What You Will Be Doing:

  • Design and implement career growth frameworks, leveling matrices, and salary structures in collaboration with team leads.

  • Oversee 360-degree feedback cycles and follow-ups to ensure actionable career development plans.

  • Partner with L&D to develop learning tracks (management, support, professional skills) and monitor program adoption & impact.

  • Work closely with leadership on talent reviews, promotions, and succession planning.

  • Define clear development paths for team members, ensuring alignment with company objectives.

  • Assess training effectiveness and refine learning programs based on business needs and employee feedback.

  • Support hiring & onboarding strategies to ensure seamless team growth.

  • Drive engagement and retention initiatives, identifying key trends and challenges.

  • Manage offboarding processes, ensuring valuable insights for continuous improvement.

About You:

  • Prior experience as an HRBP, People Partner, or similar role in a high-growth, international environment.

  • Proven track record in levelling, performance management, L&D, and career pathing.

  • Strong experience working with diverse team dynamics and cultures.

  • Strong collaboration skills with the ability to partner with leads, L&D, and employees at all levels.

  • Fluent in English

  • IT, SaaS, or fintech experience preferred (but open to strong HRBPs from other fast-paced industries).

What We Offer:

  • Fully remote and flexible working schedule, with access to a coworking space (in some locations).
  • Working with a product that matters. Our technology helps to protect millions of users and lots of online services worldwide.
  • International project. Our team works from offices in Berlin, Limassol, London, and Miami, our customers are spread from Mexico and the USA to Hong Kong, South Korea, and Singapore.
  • 1 extra day off to celebrate your birthday.
  • 7 additional days to enjoy the Christmas & New Year holidays.
  • 7 days of sick leave (without the need for documentation).
  • Regular, fully covered team offsites to connect and collaborate.
  • Learning opportunities and support to attend industry events with the team.

 

The hiring stages: TA screening -> HR BP Interview -> CHRO Interview -> Final Interview.

 

Sounds like a great opportunity for your career development? Then go ahead and apply!


We are a global community of innovators, creators, and thinkers, and we believe that diversity fuels our innovation. Sumsub is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, cultures, genders, experiences, abilities and perspectives. Join us in shaping the future inclusively.
